articles.author: Dan Balz, Scott Clement, Emily Guskin
articles.title: Trump approval sinks as Americans criticize his major policies, poll finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s 100 days poll finds a lower approval rating, growing opposition to his agenda and opposition to many of his major initiatives.
articles.content: As he nears the end of his first 100 days in office, President Donald Trump is facing growing opposition to his ambitious and controversial agenda, with his approval rating in decline, majority oppos… [+10283 chars]
